title: BRIEF-Invicta Holdings Sees HY HEPS To Increase By At Least 9 350% To 187 Cents
text:
BRIEF-Invicta Holdings Sees HY HEPS To Increase By At Least 9 350% To 187 Cents

Stock Markets 20 minutes ago (Oct 16, 2019 10:12)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Invicta Holdings Sees HY HEPS To Increase By At Least 9 350% To 187 Cents Oct 16 (Reuters) - Invicta Holdings Ltd : * INITIAL TRADING STATEMENT FOR THE SIX MONTH PERIOD ENDED 30 SEPTEMBER 2019 * HEPS EXPECTED TO INCREASE BY AT LEAST 9 350% (187 CENTS) FOR SIX MONTHS ENDED 30 SEPTEMBER 2019 * EPS EXPECTED TO INCREASE BY AT LEAST 2 337% (187 CENTS) FOR SIX MONTHS ENDED 30 SEPTEMBER 2019
